main event: A civilian female observer reported seeing an intense blue light appear suddenly in front of her car while driving, lasting for approximately 1 to 2 hours before disappearing behind a mountain.
interesting points: The object was described as having a pear shape, resembling an electric light bulb., The observer reported the object hovering over her car and appearing on all sides., The sighting occurred around dawn, and the object left just as dawn approached., The witness, a 61-year-old elementary school teacher, expressed belief that the object was interested in capturing her and her automobile., The report indicates the observer is apparently sincere but may have had possible paranoia symptoms.
witness description: civilian, female, age 61, elementary school teacher
